course.title: ADM 6287 Business Intelligence Technologies and Big Data Analytics for EBT (1.5 unit)
course.desc: Business Intelligence (BI) as a concept; review of major BI tools and methods; identification of the right types of BI for different types of decision making environments; introduction to Big Data; business applications of Big Data; review of the supporting technologies such as data bases and data warehouses and Big Data Platforms for integrating structured and unstructured data including Hadoop, sandbox analytics; Streaming Analytics, and advances in data warehousing appliances that accelerate analytics. Courses ADM 6275, ADM 6287 cannot be combined for units.Course Component: LectureExclusion: ADM 6275
